DOC.detailed_description: Obesity well establish risk factor type 2 diabetes mellitus , hypertension , dyslipidemia cardiovascular disease . Along rapid nutritional lifestyle transition feature increased energy dense diet intake reduce physical activity , prevalence obesity reach epidemic level affect 70 million Chinese adult nowadays . Previous study suggest low-carbohydrate diet effective safe way lose weight potential benefit lipid profile . However , still unknown whether diet feasible control epidemic obesity relate metabolic disease among Chinese , whose carbohydrate consumption contribute approximately 55 % total energy intake . Therefore , aim pilot study investigate adherence effectiveness two weight-loss diet among Chinese . This randomize , control clinical trial . A total 50 overweight obese nurse assistant randomly assign receive low-carbohydrate diet traditional high-carbohydrate Chinese restricted-calories diet 12 week . The adherence study protocol effect two diet body weight , waist circumference , body fat , fast glucose lipid profile evaluate .
